layout.singingstanza: Whom hav -- ing not seen, you love, you love; in -- to whom though not see -- ing Him at pre -- sent, yet be -- liev -- ing; Whom hav -- ing not seen, you love, you love; in -- to whom though not see -- ing Him at pre -- sent, yet be -- liev -- ing, you ex -- ult with joy that is un -- speak -- a -- ble and full of glo -- ry. You ex -- ult with joy that is un -- speak -- a -- ble and full of glo -- ry. First Pe -- ter One: Eight.

lyrics.stanza: Whom having not seen, you love, you love; Into whom though not seeing Him at present, yet believing; Whom having not seen, you love, you love; Into whom though not seeing Him at present, yet believing, You exult with joy That is unspeakable And full of glory. You exult with joy That is unspeakable And full of glory. First Peter 1:8.
